title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H1 - Jul 2 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H1 - Jul 2 2022
description:
SCOTUS rules in favor of high school football coach fired for praying after games. "Light It on Fire!" Pro-abortion activists call for violence. Clay says real calls for violence call for real arrests. Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot screams, "F*ck you, Clarence Thomas!" Woke corporations promise to pay for women to travel for abortions. Buck asks, could this have anything to do with the companies having to give less maternity leave? Whoopi Goldberg makes racist comments about Clarence Thomas' wife. Ana Navarro cites special needs relatives as argument for abortion. Ronald Reagan on abortion. Report: Johnny Depp to get over $300 million to play Captain Jack Sparrow again. Top Gun: Maverick is Tom Cruise's biggest movie ever.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
